definitions.definition: a flat area for walking on, built across the space between the sides of a boat:
examples: We sat on deck until it was dark.

definitions.definition: one of the floors of a bus:
examples: the upper/top deck of the bus

definitions.definition: a wooden floor built outside, where people can sit and relax
on a level of a ship below the main deck:
to decorate or add something to something to make an effect:
examples: The room was decked with flowers.
